{!Today()}
Dear IHS Markit Customer,
Thank you for contacting our Customer Care Team, we have received your request.
A unique case reference number "{!Case.CaseNumber}" with the subject "{!Case.Subject}" is currently being reviewed by one of our specialists.
In order to allow you to track the progress of your enquiry, please quote the above case reference number when contacting us. Someone will be in touch with you shortly to ensure that your request is handled to your satisfaction.
Kind regards, IHS Markit | Customer Care Contact Us
